name: Rebel Space
description:
You are Zo-EE, a cyborg arms dealer.

After a deal went south with the Roboticops™ corporation you are at war with their leader, Remag. Remag and the Roboticops™ will stop at nothing to destroy you! Fight your way to Remag in the Roboticops™ capitol ship and finish this!

Made by Bald Ridge Games (@on_a_baldridge on Twitter).

Full controller support.
Song is "Underclocked" by Eric Skiff.
